definition: casual and unrestrained in sexual behavior, lewd or lascivious woman, behave extremely cruelly and brutally
details:
adjective
- casual and unrestrained in sexual behavior
= synonyms: easy
- occurring without motivation or provocation
= synonyms: motiveless, unprovoked
noun
- lewd or lascivious woman
verb
- behave extremely cruelly and brutally
- engage in amorous play
- become extravagant
= synonyms: luxuriate
- spend wastefully
= example: spend wastefully
= synonyms: wanton away, trifle away
- indulge in a carefree or voluptuous way of life
- waste time
= synonyms: trifle, piddle, dally, dawdle, wanton away, piddle away
